Title: The AWS Challenge (4):
Prompt: Design, build, or code your best hack that makes use of two services from AWS’s broad suite of tools.

Title: The Splunk Challenge (8):
Prompt: Finish at the top of the leaderboard in either session of Splunk’s reverse capture-the-flag competition.

Title: Best Hardware (4):
Prompt: For the best hack that makes use of hardware on demo day.

Title: Best Use of Data (4):
Prompt: For the hack with the best data visualization or model. Bonus points for attending the BioInformatics session!

Title: Beginner Hacker Award (4):
Prompt: For a team of newcomers who show admirable spirit and a desire to learn.

Title: Hack for the People (4):
Prompt: For the best hack that promotes social good.

Title: The Ingenuity Hack (4):
Prompt: For the top wildcard “how did they do that?!” hack.
